Title: Endgame
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Nic Van Zeebroeck, Michael Sopczynski, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story editor), Michael Sopczynski (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker
Plot: Finch receives 38 numbers at once from the Machine. He discovers they are connected to an unknown player who is inciting an all-out war between HR and the Russian mob.
